headline: North Dakota Debuts First State-Backed ‘Roughrider’ Stablecoin for 2026 Launch
summary: North Dakota is preparing to launch its own state-backed stablecoin, the “Roughrider Coin,” in 2026 through the Bank of North Dakota, marking a major step in the state’s digital finance strategy. The project seeks to make North Dakota the second U.S. state to issue a government-backed stablecoin, following Wyoming’s Frontier ...

headline: North Dakota to Launch Roughrider Coin: First US State-Backed Stablecoin on Fiserv Platform
summary: Bank of North Dakota, in collaboration with financial technology giant Fiserv, has announced plans to launch Roughrider Coin, the first state-backed stablecoin in the US. According to official reports, Roughrider Coin will launch on the Fiserv digital asset platform, fully backed by US dollars. It will be available to North ...

headline: North Dakota To Launch “Roughrider” USD Stablecoin
summary: North Dakota partners with Fiserv to launch Roughrider Coin, a USD-backed stablecoin driving state crypto innovation.

headline: Milind Joshi Joins Striim as VP of Payment Solutions to Drive Enterprise Payments, ERP Integrations, and AI-Ready Data Innovation
summary: Headshot of Milind Joshi Headshot of Milind Joshi from Striim PALO ALTO, Calif., Oct. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Striim, a recognized leader in real-time data integration and intelligence, is delighted to announce the appointment of Milind Joshi to its leadership team as Vice President of Payment Solutions. With decades of experience across payments, ERP, and enterprise systems, Joshi will spearhead initiatives that minimize data latency, optimize data estates, and unlock AI-powered outcomes f

headline: North Dakota to Issue Stablecoin With Fiserv as Digital Dollar Trend Expands
summary: The Fiserv-powered U.S. dollar stablecoin will be available to local banks and credit unions, joining crypto experiments by U.S. states.
